channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken mirror on road, 11th May
item.description:
Two patches of broken mirror near each other. Thanks for dealing with this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Brooklyn Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlights not working around public green space and path to Butts Lane, 11th May
item.description:
Numbers 19, 21 and 22 not working. Possibly number 20 which is at top of path to Butts Lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jennings Orchard, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes in the road, 11th May
item.description:
On a section of Dunster Road where it turns to join Wentworth Road there are multiple potholes where previously filled potholes have broken up and further potholes are appearing due to the entire road surface breaking up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Dunster Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in left lane after the motorway bridge just before the left turn into airport, 11th May
item.description:
Pothole in left lane after the motorway bridge just before the left turn into airport
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bamfurlong Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Reindeer carcass, 11th May
item.description:
Sad to report a dead animal near the side of the path. It's attracting flies and the smell is terrible. Could we have some assistance getting this removed please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain outside school, 10th May
item.description:
The drain on the opposite side of the road to the school is completely full of leaves/mud. The road floods at this point.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover, 10th May
item.description:
Insecure knocking mam hole cover in Hatherley Lane at the front of the Nuffield Hospital. It is a constant knocking every time a car drives past. Previously reported.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 10th May
item.description:
Verges are being destroyed. Can a tree be planted to stop this.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole has returned on Green Lane, 10th May
item.description:
Opposite driveway of “Woodhay”. This was reported and fixed (FixMyStreet ref: 5831543) however, the filled in pothole has already crumbled away to expose the original problem again
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -FW6 Potholes problem, 10th May
